links.title: Ofgem price for customers on a standard variable tariff (default tariff)
links.tooltip: Ofgem price for customers on a standard variable tariff (default tariff)

options.content: Any prices are calculated using the most recent price per kWh and standing charges from Ofgem using the default standard variable tariff. This price changes every quarter and so any longer term prices will use the latest values, meaning the actual cost may have been higher or lower.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "current_power")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "today_energy")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> sum()

panels.description: Including standard variable tariff standing charge
panels.title: Cost estimate (today so far)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "month_energy")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> sum()

panels.description: Including standard variable tariff standing charge
panels.title: Cost estimate (this month so far)

targets.query:
import "date"
import "math"

cur_date = now()
cur_year = date.year(t: cur_date)
cur_month = date.month(t: cur_date)
cur_day = date.monthDay(t: cur_date)
leap_year = if math.remainder(x: float(v: cur_year), y: 400.0) == 0.0 then
  1
else if math.remainder(x: float(v: cur_year), y: 4.0) == 0.0 and math.remainder(x: float(v: cur_year), y: 100.0) != 0.0 then
  1
else
  0
days_in_month = if contains(value: cur_month, set: [4, 6, 9, 11]) then
  30
else if contains(value: cur_month, set: [2,]) and leap_year == 0 then
  28
else if contains(value: cur_month, set: [2,]) and leap_year == 1 then
  29
else
  31

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "month_energy")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    cur_year: cur_year,
    leap_year: leap_year,
    _value: float(v: (r._value / cur_day * days_in_month))
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.description: Including standard variable tariff standing charge, it takes the current kWh value, divides by the number of day in the month so far, then multiplies it by number of days in the month, calculating in price per kWh and standing charge.

targets.query:
import "date"
import "math"

cur_date = now()
cur_year = date.year(t: cur_date)
cur_month = date.month(t: cur_date)
cur_day = date.monthDay(t: cur_date)
leap_year = if math.remainder(x: float(v: cur_year), y: 400.0) == 0.0 then
  1
else if math.remainder(x: float(v: cur_year), y: 4.0) == 0.0 and math.remainder(x: float(v: cur_year), y: 100.0) != 0.0 then
  1
else
  0
days_in_month = if contains(value: cur_month, set: [4, 6, 9, 11]) then
  30
else if contains(value: cur_month, set: [2,]) and leap_year == 0 then
  28
else if contains(value: cur_month, set: [2,]) and leap_year == 1 then
  29
else
  31

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "month_energy")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    cur_year: cur_year,
    leap_year: leap_year,
    _value: (
      float(v: ((r._value / 1000) / cur_day) * days_in_month) * ${price_per_kwh}
    ) + (
      float(v: days_in_month) * ${standing_charge}
    )
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Cost prediction (this month)

panels.description: Excluding standard variable tariff standing charge

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "today_energy")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    _value: (float(v: r._value) / 1000.0) * ${price_per_kwh}
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    _field: if r.name == "pc" then
      "PC"
    else if r.name == "rack" then
      "Rack"
    else if r.name == "tv" then
      "TV"
    else if r.name == "kettle" then
      "Kettle"
    else if r.name == "fridge" then
      "Fridge/Freezer"
    else if r.name == "microwave" then
      "Microwave"
    else if r.name == "washing_machine" then
      "Washing Machine"
    else if r.name == "fan" then
      "Fan"
    else if r.name == "qi_charger" then
      "Qi Charger"
    else if r.name == "water_fountain" then
      "Cat Water Fountain"
    else if r.name == "alexa" then
      "Alexa"
    else
      r.name,
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> sort()

panels.description: Excluding standard variable tariff standing charge

  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "month_energy")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    _value: (float(v: r._value) / 1000.0) * ${price_per_kwh}
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    _field: if r.name == "pc" then
      "PC"
    else if r.name == "rack" then
      "Rack"
    else if r.name == "tv" then
      "TV"
    else if r.name == "kettle" then
      "Kettle"
    else if r.name == "fridge" then
      "Fridge/Freezer"
    else if r.name == "microwave" then
      "Microwave"
    else if r.name == "washing_machine" then
      "Washing Machine"
    else if r.name == "fan" then

panels.title: Cost estimate for this month so far (by device)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "today_energy")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    _value: (float(v: r._value) / 1000.0) * ${price_per_kwh}
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({r with
    _field: if r.room == "kitchen" then
      "Kitchen"
    else if r.room == "office" then
      "Office"
    else if r.room == "living_room" then
      "Living Room"
    else if r.room == "bedroom" then
      "Bedroom"
    else if r.room == "hallway" then
      "Hallway"
    else
      r.room,
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> sort()

panels.description: Excluding standard variable tariff standing charge

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)

  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    _value: (float(v: r._value) / 1000.0) * ${price_per_kwh}
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({r with
    _field: if r.room == "kitchen" then
      "Kitchen"
    else if r.room == "office" then
      "Office"
    else if r.room == "living_room" then
      "Living Room"
    else if r.room == "bedroom" then

    else
      r.room,

panels.title: Cost estimate for this month so far (by rooom)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "current_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if "${exclude_kettle}" == "true" then r.name != "kettle" else r._field == "current_power")
  |> group(columns: ["_time"], mode:"by")
  |> sum(column: "_value")
  |> group()
  |> fill(value: 0)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

import "strings"

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_monthly_total" and r._field == "total_sum")
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    _time: strings.substring(end: 7, start: 0, v: string(v: r._time))
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

panels.description: Estimated. Using the current price per kWh and standing charges, so months outside of the current price cap which is set per quarter may have been higher or lower

targets.query:
import "date"
import "math"
import "strings"

cur_date = now()
cur_year = date.year(t: cur_date)
cur_month = date.month(t: cur_date)
cur_day = date.monthDay(t: cur_date)
leap_year = if math.remainder(x: float(v: cur_year), y: 400.0) == 0.0 then
  1
else if math.remainder(x: float(v: cur_year), y: 4.0) == 0.0 and math.remainder(x: float(v: cur_year), y: 100.0) != 0.0 then
  1
else
  0
days_in_month = if contains(value: cur_month, set: [4, 6, 9, 11]) then
  30
else if contains(value: cur_month, set: [2,]) and leap_year == 0 then
  28
else if contains(value: cur_month, set: [2,]) and leap_year == 1 then
  29
else
  31

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -1y)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_monthly_total" and r._field == "total_sum")
  |> group(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    _time: strings.substring(end: 7, start: 0, v: string(v: r._time)),
    _value: (
      float(v: ((r._value / 1000) / cur_day) * days_in_month) * ${price_per_kwh}
    ) + (
      float(v: days_in_month) * ${standing_charge}
    )
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

panels.title: Cost (year)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "current_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if "${exclude_kettle}" == "true" then r.name != "kettle" else r._field == "current_power")
  |> fill(value: 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    _field: if r.name == "pc" then
      "PC"
    else if r.name == "rack" then
      "Rack"
    else if r.name == "tv" then
      "TV"
    else if r.name == "kettle" then
      "Kettle"
    else if r.name == "fridge" then
      "Fridge/Freezer"
    else if r.name == "microwave" then
      "Microwave"
    else if r.name == "washing_machine" then
      "Washing Machine"
    else if r.name == "fan" then
      "Fan"
    else if r.name == "qi_charger" then
      "Qi Charger"
    else if r.name == "water_fountain" then
      "Cat Water Fountain"
    else if r.name == "alexa" then
      "Alexa"
    else
      r.name,
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

import "math"

telegraf_send_freq = 10
interval_seconds = int(v: math.mMax(x: float(v: $__interval_ms) / 1000.0, y: float(v: telegraf_send_freq)))
window_period = duration(v: string(v: interval_seconds) + "s")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_consumption" and r._field == "current_power")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => if "${exclude_kettle}" == "true" then r.name != "kettle" else r._field == "current_power")
  |> fill(value: 0)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "room"])
  |> group(columns: ["room"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: window_period, fn: sum)
  |> map(fn: (r) =>  ({r with
    room: if r.room == "kitchen" then
      "Kitchen"
    else if r.room == "office" then
      "Office"
    else if r.room == "living_room" then
      "Living Room"
    else if r.room == "bedroom" then
      "Bedroom"
    else if r.room == "hallway" then
      "Hallway"
    else
      r.room,
    _value: r._value / (interval_seconds / telegraf_send_freq),
  }))

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_price" and r._field == "price_per_kwh")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

list.definition:
import "strings"

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "p110_energy_price" and r._field == "standing_charge")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: strings.substring(end: 10, start: 0, v: string(v: r._time))}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
